description: Design a REST API for a payment processing platform. The API manages four resources: Merchants (id, name, business_type, status), Payments (id, merchant_id, amount, currency, status enum: pending/processing/completed/failed/refunded, created_at), Refunds (id, payment_id, amount, reason, status, created_at), and Webhooks (id, merchant_id, url, events array, secret, is_active). The API uses OAuth2 client_credentials authentication. Payment creation should be asynchronous (return 202 Accepted). All paths should use /v1/ prefix. List endpoints should support pagination. The API should be production-ready.
